EmailTemplate.description: Notification when system changes GMPL to BX009
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL/ BX009: Creation of new BX009
EmailTemplate.subject: New BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c} ' is created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, A new BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has been created. Please review the BX009 and fill up the necessary details. The BX009 can be accessed via {!GMPL_BX009__c.Link}
Thanks.
